```{r setup}
library(rnaturalearth)
library(tidyverse)
library(wbstats)


indicator_info <- filter(wb_cachelist$indicators, indicator_id == "SL.EMP.SELF.ZS")

ne_countries(returnclass = "sf") %>%
  left_join(
    wb_data(
      c(self_employed = "SL.EMP.SELF.ZS"), 
         mrnev = 1
          ),
    c("iso_a3" = "iso3c")
  ) %>%
  filter(iso_a3 != "ATA") %>% # remove Anarctica
  ggplot(aes(fill = self_employed)) +
  geom_sf() +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(labels = scales::percent_format(scale = 1)) +
  theme(legend.position="bottom") +
  labs(
    title = indicator_info$indicator,
    fill = NULL,
    caption = paste("Source:", indicator_info$source_org) 
  )
  
```
